alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Western Essex; Western King and Queen (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Caroline and northwestern Essex Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Milford, Loretto, Beazley, Sparta, Hustle, Elevon, Supply, Central Point, Salvia and Penola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Western Essex; Western King and Queen
